column4: Anyone have any tips/tricks to stabilize Firefox and Adobe Flash content on Ubunty 8.04??
stabilize? it works fine for me, you might want to install the version from Adobe's website instead of from the Ubuntu repo though
ive never had as few problems with a version of linux as with this one, so i guess we balance out?
is it only crashes on flash pages, or other pages too? if gmail crashes then it is probably not flash related
